name: prefix_letv
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.letv.com"){
div.Y-Like,
div.D-Look,
div.Banner,
div.J-odeum,
div.Comment,
div.Cooperation,
div.Letv-tui,
div.Foot,
ul.popUp-fixed,
div.Detail-baike,
div.Detail,
div.ad_pop_small,
li#bdshare,
div.v-b,
div#egg,
div.column.zongyiji,
div.column.look_lemi,
div.column.column_banner,
div#a_column_banner_01,
div.Line,
div.so_bot,
div.z-bg,
div.tip.J-juji-toggle-all,
span.video-resp,
div.login_speed1.j-ub-tips,
[id^="JS_AD_"],
.le_recom,
.Rank,
.Info,
.Search,
.Hot,
.column.le_other,
.column.le_intro,
.column.le_tuijian,
.column.le_foot,
.column.le_func
{
  display:none!important;
}

}

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://comic.letv.com/"){
ul.popUp-fixed,
div#_widget_157,
div#_widget_654,
div#_widget_898,
div#_widget_635,
div#_widget_502
{
  display:none!important;
}

}
